word: H3558 - כּוּמָז - kûwmâz - koo-mawz' - Tablet - பலகை

sections.paragraph: ornaments, golden ornament; maybe the armlets of gold?, tablets
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root meaning to store away; a jewel (probably gold beads): - tablet.
